preferences.name: registryUrl

preferences.description: Base URL for the UDS Registry

preferences.name: sessionCookie
preferences.title: Session Cookie (Optional)
preferences.description: ⚠️ SECURITY: Treat like a password. DO NOT sync/backup preferences with this value. Value of the 'uds_session' cookie from your browser for authenticated access. Get it from DevTools → Application → Cookies → registry.defenseunicorns.com → uds_session. Leave empty for public access.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
